snippet.title: Atlas' Fate : Between Light & Darkness - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Atlas' Fate : Between Light & Darkness

"Merge with the shadows"

In this game, you take control of a stealth expert with the ability to merge with the shadows. This power allows him to move without being seen, move through walls, cushion falls or pass through obstacles.

The game is being developed as part of the final project of the Master in Creation of Videogames, at University Pompeu Fabra, Barcelona, Spain (2017-2018).

Download it now on:
http://atlasfate.com/

Milestone 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2rDemC5er8
Milestone 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Ia6nTbuntY
Milestone 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Xc6nGXyjjI
Milestone 4: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fOAoZXOALzE

Don't forget to follow us in Twitter, Instragram and Discord!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BabyRobotGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/babyrobotgames
Discord: https://discord.gg/k5BfMJj

-------------------------------------------
Music provided by Non Copyrighted Music: https://youtu.be/rGueLnZShyY

Music used: Titan Striker by Evan King 
https://soundcloud.com/evan-king/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/evankingaudio
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EvanKingAudio
-------------------------------------------
